author: Tom Carreras
title: White House Crypto Chief Bo Hines Met With El Salvador’s Bukele to Discuss Bitcoin
description: "Extraordinary things" could happen for the United States and El Salvador as a result of the meeting, said Salvadoran Bitcoin Office Director Stacy Herbert.
content:
El Salvador and the United States are looking to ramp up their crypto partnership.
Bo Hines, the executive director of the White Houses Presidential Council of Advisers for Digital Assets, met with … [+1518 chars]
